titles.title: Ban on Human Cloning Act
To prohibit the cloning of humans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.
For Further Action See H.R. 1644 and H.R. 2505.

bill.summary: 3/28/2001--Introduced. Ban on Human Cloning Act - Prohibits any person from engaging in a human cloning procedure (the transfer of a nucleus of a human somatic cell into an egg cell from which the nucleus has been removed) with the intent of implanting the resulting cellular product into a uterus. Sets forth criminal penalties.
